page.title: 03Bicknoller Flower Show
page.content: { Bicknoller Flower Show}has got all kinds of flowers.It also exhibits home made jams, many varieties of plants, vegetables and fruits . At the show there are all in kinds of{activities}going on. They have skittles and pony rides. They have childrens classes that cater for drawing, painting,modelling and other kinds of things . The flower show this year is to be held on Saturday July 27 It is held at this time because it is usually nice weather for the flowers. People came from all over the place to see it. There are a great number of{prizes,} {trophies and cups.}These have all kinds of names like the Capewell cup,the Secretary cup ,the Novice cup ,the Lutterel cup ,and the Childrens cup . There is also a flower arrangment trophy.
